Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a light-brown pottery vessel, the fabric is grey in section, the interior is lightly spotted with a dark-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a light-brown slip and remains of four lines of black-painted demotic text.
Curator's comments: Being studied for publication by Bryan Kraemer. Cemeteries and Osireion Excavations Group
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393880) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393880)
Almásy-Martin 2020 / Demotic, Greek and Coptic ostraca from Abydos in the British Museum (no.25)
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: O.BM Abydos Dem. 25 (Edition abbreviation according to Oates et al. 2001)
